description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Laska Paste & Prawn Laksa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn Laska Paste & Prawn Laksa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g green banana prawns, peeled and deviened
1 cup green beans, cut into 2cm lengths
0.33 cup laksa paste (see basic laksa paste recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: Basic Laska Paste: Process red chillies, garlic cloves, shallots, ginger, lemongrass, cumin, raw macadamia nuts, fish sauce and sesame oil into a food processor until mixture forms a smooth paste. Prawn Laska
Cook noodles in boiling water following packet directions. Drain and divide among 4 large serving bowls.
Heat oil in a large saucepan over high heat. Add prawns and cook until golden. Transfer to a plate. Add paste to pan and cook for 1 minute or until fragrant.

Add stock and bring to the boil. Add beans and cook for 1-2 minutes. Return prawns to pan and cook for 1 minute or until cooked through and beans are tender. Stir in milk and season with salt and pepper.
Ladle soup into the bowls over noodles and garnish with onion, sprouts and capsicum. Serve with lime.
